Class CompassController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.viewcontroller.CompassController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class CompassController
extends Object
implements Controller
    A MVC controller for the compass view.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret
